com.googlecode.junittoolbox
Annotation Type IncludeCategories

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface IncludeCategories

This annotation can be used with the WildcardPatternSuite and the ParallelSuite runner to include tests if they are annotated with @Category. In contrast to the standard JUnit @IncludeCategory annotation this annotation allows you to specify not only one but several classes.

Required Element Summary
 Class<?>[] value
           
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract Class<?>[] value
